summary: A Mod Compilation using only the highest quality Mods
descriptionHtml:
SHAMROCK\'s MOD COMPILATION

Files
Enhanced Blood Textures V 0.07a
Ceramic potions V3.0
Ceramic Poisions V3.0


The Files will be updated when the Authors of the files release new ones


1.The Files in this pack have been created by the respective Authors and not me

2.Premission for the Following files have been granted

3.If there are any files you would like to see here please pm me

4.If you would like me too create the same installer file for your mod please pm me

5.I can Also make patchers so if you require my services please pm me



CONTENTS


Enhanced Blood Textures V 0.07a
Author:dDefinder

Info:Improved blood texture detail and increased resolution from 512 to 2048. Main plugin will adjust blood size, duration, and amount for screen blood, wounds and hit splatters. Including longer blood duration on weapons and separating world placed blood from hit splatters. New screen blood textures to have more of a splatter appearance rather than a dot.

Ceramic potions V3.0
Ceramic poisions V3.0
Author:Unknown                                                                           

thank you to all the authors who gave me premission to use their files
author: shamrock123
